ygData.subject: RE: New Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: Right, the only difference between me at 19 to 21 and you at 15 should have been the changes that occurred in the code between when you were 15th and when I
ygData.messageBody:
Right, the only difference between me at 19 to 21 and you at 15 should have
been the changes that occurred in the code between when you were 15th and
when I was 21st. Our guild has a bard who just made 16th and he has the
same problems with lullabying the Reavers that I do, only moreso since his
resist rates are even higher since they are still yellow to him.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 4:00 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New Lullaby theory


From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>

yeah that makes things seem wierder. I was doing reavers with a group at
15th and had no problems at all keeping them lulled......
----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 5:20 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lullaby theory


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> I'm 22nd level and it definitely does not work properly, nor as it once
did,
> for me. On even cons I get almost the same resist rate as you do John amd
> against lvl 1 mobs I get a slightly worse one, probably due to being 20
CHA
> points lower. I've tried using it on 3 blue gnoll reavers and I couldn't
> keep them asleep long enough to not get bashed out of the song nearly
> continuously.
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, February 22, 2000 3:16 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] New Lullaby theory
>
>
> From: kim@...
>
> This theory came up on the concert hall board. A bard there
> claimed to have used Lullaby with great success in Runnyeye.
>
> Anyways, my new theory is that somewhere in the resist check
> when GZ should've used the mob's level, he accidently used the
> bard's level. So if you (the bard) are relatively low level,
> the song works reasonably well against even con mobs. But if
> you are high level, the minimum resist rate is that of a high
> level mob.
>
> It has a lot of holes, but it warrants checking out. So if
> you are L15-25 or so, could you try logging some of your
> Lullaby episodes? If I remember, Kitasi is about the right
> level for Runnyeye, no? :) You can pull out the data
> yourself, or email the logfile to me and I'll do it.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
>
>
